item.title: Substance Audit: Neurochemical Tool Deployment
item.description:
Substance Audit: Neurochemical Tool Deployment

Summary: Frame substance history as functional tool deployment. Audit function/ROI, adopt or decommission. History becomes a log of tool iteration.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 2–5

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.

item.title: Substance Progression Timeline (Tool History)
item.description:
Substance Progression Timeline (Tool History)

Summary: Mapped progression: tobacco early teens; alcohol social; herbál betrayal/medical escape; weed modulation/ROI decline; mushrooms in stasis; Xanax rejected.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 4

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
